bug.author: seanpmorgan
bug.summary: Attention wrapper tests fail for float64 dtype
bug.description: Since <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/e17b7ca1a8745d63ead4f4097d48ef0891b37f0f>tensorflow/tensorflow@e17b7ca</denchmark-link> the autocast dtype is causing failures. Should be a rather straight forward fix.
